thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: My Journey Back Into Advising: Seven Questions to Ponder

author: Norb Vonnegut
title: My Journey Back Into Advising: Seven Questions to Ponder
text:
Shortly after the start of 2018, I launched a financial advisory boutique. I had no clients but brought solid experience from two very different kinds of firms. Years ago, I had been a partner on a wirehouse team with over $1 billion in assets under management. We broke away to join a registered investment adviser, which I subsequently left to write suspense thrillers about Wall Street.
These days, I believe small wealth advisory firms wield several competitive advantages over industry behemoths. There are fewer constraints...
